explains: n. 浅色，淡色调；染发剂，染发；一丝；（用平行线表现阴影的）线晕；（印刷）底色

sentences.en: Its large leaves often show a delicate purple tint.
sentences.cn: 它的大叶子常现出一种柔和的淡紫色。

sentences.en: We rose-tint our memories and put ourselves into self-affirming situations.
sentences.cn: 我们美化了自己的记忆，把自己置于自我肯定的情境中。

sentences.en: You'll need the dark tint in the south.
sentences.cn: 你们需要在黑暗的掩护下向南走。
